bonus.value: When dealing physical damage, increase final damage by 4%/5%/6%/7% and physical damage by an additional 2%/2.5%/3%/3.5% for 3 seconds. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

When equipping 2 or more physical weapons, increase final damage by 15%/17%/19%/21%. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

mind.name: Ensorcellement
mind.desc: Plonge doucement mais sûrement le public et vous-même dans l'illusion magique.

memory.name: Mystification
memory.desc: Les lois fondamentales sont la duperie, le détournement et la manipulation. Je me les rappelle avant chaque spectacle.

belief.name: Charme
belief.desc: Parfois, "elle" ne peut décider entre parfaite inconscience ou feinte ignorance.

emotion.name: Tromperie
emotion.desc: Elle doit mentir à tout le monde, y compris à elle-même.
